subject: You've been accepted for finance for your Howdens order!

rows.text: {{extras.branch.trading_name}} has been notified that your finance application is approved. They'll get in touch with you soon to schedule delivery of your goods.

rows.subtext: When some or all of your order has been delivered, we'll ask you if everything is ok. After you sign off on the delivery we'll get your tradesperson paid.
For finance queries please email Kanda at howdens@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
